analysis.key_quote: the reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as schedule F would politicize the NIH.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern that the proposed rule would politicize the NIH, which indicates opposition to the rule. It highlights the potential negative impact on public trust and the integrity of federally funded science, aligning with themes of politicization and merit-based systems.
